summary: After their friend goes missing, five road-tripping friends must confront a violent biker gang, but after they narrowly escape, their nightmare goes from bad to spine-chilling.
cast: Tristan Parrish Moore|Hannah Risinger|Jonathan Haltiwanger|Marcelle Bowman|Robert Dean|Algernon D'Ammassa|Jack Lutz|Jason Rivera|Michael Ryan Cunningham|Karin Keesling|John Hutchinson|Derek Weikel|Anthony Ford|Connor Sanders|Patrick McKinley|Brett Henderson
title: Eaters
